173.short_effect: Strengthens biting moves to 1.5× their power.
173.long_effetct: Strengthens biting moves to 1.5× their power.

174.name: refrigerate
174.short_effect: Turns the bearer's []{type:normal} moves into []{type:ice} moves and strengthens them to 1.3× their power.
174.long_effetct: Turns the bearer's []{type:normal}-type moves into []{type:ice}-type moves.  Moves changed by this ability have 1.3× their power.

175.name: sweet-veil
175.prose:
Prevents itself and ally Pokémon
from falling asleep.

176.name: stance-change
176.prose:
The Pokémon changes form
depending on how it battles.
176.short_effect: Changes []{pokemon:aegislash} to Blade Forme before using a damaging move, or Shield Forme before using []{move:kings-shield}.
176.long_effetct: Changes []{pokemon:aegislash} to Blade Forme before using a damaging move, or Shield Forme before using []{move:kings-shield}.

177.name: gale-wings
177.short_effect: Raises []{type:flying} moves' priority by one stage.
177.long_effetct: Raises []{type:flying} moves' priority by one stage.

178.name: mega-launcher
178.prose: Powers up aura and pulse moves.
178.short_effect: Strengthens aura and pulse moves to 1.5× their power.
178.long_effetct: Strengthens aura and pulse moves to 1.5× their power.

179.name: grass-pelt
179.prose:
Boosts the Defense stat
in Grassy Terrain.
179.short_effect: Boosts Defense while []{move:grassy-terrain} is in effect.
179.long_effetct: Boosts Defense while []{move:grassy-terrain} is in effect.

180.name: symbiosis
180.prose:
The Pokémon can pass
an item to an ally.
180.short_effect: Passes the bearer's held item to an ally when the ally uses up its item.
180.long_effetct: Passes the bearer's held item to an ally when the ally uses up its item.

181.name: tough-claws
181.prose:
Powers up moves that
make direct contact.
181.short_effect: Strengthens moves that make contact to 1.33× their power.
181.long_effetct: Strengthens moves that make contact to 1.33× their power.

182.name: pixilate
182.short_effect: Turns the bearer's []{type:normal} moves into []{type:fairy} moves and strengthens them to 1.3× their power.
182.long_effetct: Turns the bearer's []{type:normal}-type moves into []{type:fairy} moves.  Moves changed by this ability have 1.3× their power.

183.name: gooey
183.prose:
Contact with the Pokémon
lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.
183.short_effect: Lowers attacking Pokémon's Speed by one stage on contact.
183.long_effetct: Lowers attacking Pokémon's Speed by one stage on contact.

184.name: aerilate
184.short_effect: Turns the bearer's []{type:normal} moves into []{type:flying} moves and strengthens them to 1.3× their power.
184.long_effetct: Turns the bearer's []{type:normal}-type moves into []{type:flying}-type moves.  Moves changed by this ability have 1.3× their power.

185.name: parental-bond
185.short_effect: Lets the bearer hit twice with damaging moves.  The second hit has half power.
185.long_effetct: Lets the bearer hit twice with damaging moves.  The second hit has half power.

186.name: dark-aura
186.prose:
Powers up each Pokémon’s
Dark-type moves.
186.short_effect: Strengthens []{type:dark} moves to 1.33× their power for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.
186.long_effetct: Strengthens []{type:dark} moves for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.

187.name: fairy-aura
187.prose:
Powers up each Pokémon’s
Fairy-type moves.
187.short_effect: Strengthens []{type:fairy} moves to 1.33× their power for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.
187.long_effetct: Strengthens []{type:fairy} moves for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.

188.name: aura-break
188.prose:
The effects of “Aura” Abilities
are reversed.
188.short_effect: Makes []{ability:dark-aura} and []{ability:fairy-aura} weaken moves of their respective types.
188.long_effetct: While this Pokémon is on the field, []{ability:dark-aura} and []{ability:fairy-aura} weaken moves of their respective types to 2/3 their power, rather than strengthening them.

189.name: primordial-sea
189.prose:
Affects weather and nullifies any
Fire-type attacks.
189.short_effect: Creates heavy rain, which has all the properties of Rain Dance, cannot be replaced, and causes damaging Fire moves to fail.
189.long_effetct:
When this Pokémon enters battle or gains this ability, the weather becomes heavy rain.  Heavy rain has all the properties of []{move:rain-dance} and also causes damaging Fire moves to fail.

Heavy rain ends when this Pokémon leaves battle or loses this ability, or when this ability is nullified.  The weather cannot otherwise be changed except by the effects of []{ability:delta-stream} and []{ability:desolate-land}.

[]{ability:air-lock} and []{ability:cloud-nine} will prevent the effects of heavy rain, including allowing Fire moves to work, but will not allow the weather to be changed.

190.name: desolate-land
190.prose:
Affects weather and nullifies any
Water-type attacks.
190.short_effect: Creates extremely harsh sunlight, which has all the properties of Sunny Day, cannot be replaced, and causes damaging Water moves to fail.
190.long_effetct:
When this Pokémon enters battle or gains this ability, the weather becomes extremely harsh sunlight.  Extremely harsh sunlight has all the properties of []{move:sunny-day} and also causes damaging Water moves to fail.

Extremely harsh sunlight ends when this Pokémon leaves battle or loses this ability, or when this ability is nullified.  The weather cannot otherwise be changed except by the effects of []{ability:delta-stream} and []{ability:primordial-sea}.

[]{ability:air-lock} and []{ability:cloud-nine} will prevent the effects of extremely harsh sunlight, including allowing Water moves to work, but will not allow the weather to be changed.

191.name: delta-stream
191.prose:
Affects weather and eliminates all
of the Flying type’s weaknesses.
191.short_effect: Creates a mysterious air current, which cannot be replaced and causes moves to never be super effective against Flying Pokémon.
191.long_effetct:
When this Pokémon enters battle or gains this ability, the weather becomes a mysterious air current.  A mysterious air current causes moves to not be super effective against Flying; they do neutral damage instead.  []{ability:anticipation} and []{move:stealth-rock} are not affected.

The mysterious air current ends when this Pokémon leaves battle or loses this ability, or when this ability is nullified.  The weather cannot otherwise be changed except by the effects of []{ability:desolate-land} and []{ability:primordial-sea}.

[]{ability:air-lock} and []{ability:cloud-nine} will prevent the effect of a mysterious air current, but will not allow the weather to be changed.

192.name: stamina
192.prose: Boosts the Defense stat when hit by an attack.
192.short_effect: Raises this Pokémon's Defense by one stage when it takes damage from a move.
192.long_effetct: Raises this Pokémon's Defense by one stage when it takes damage from a move.

193.name: wimp-out
193.prose:
The Pokémon cowardly switches out when its HP
becomes half or less.
193.short_effect: This Pokémon automatically switches out when its HP drops below half.
193.long_effetct: After this Pokémon is hit by a move, if that move caused this Pokémon's HP to drop below half, it switches out.

194.name: emergency-exit
194.prose:
The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its
HP becomes half or less.
194.short_effect: This Pokémon automatically switches out when its HP drops below half.
194.long_effetct: After this Pokémon is hit by a move, if that move caused this Pokémon's HP to drop below half, it switches out.

195.name: water-compaction
195.prose:
Boosts the Pokémon’s Defense stat sharply when hit
by a Water-type move.
195.short_effect: Raises this Pokémon's Defense by two stages when it's hit by a Water move.
195.long_effetct: Raises this Pokémon's Defense by two stages when it's hit by a Water move.

196.name: merciless
196.prose:
The Pokémon’s attacks become critical hits if the
target is poisoned.
196.short_effect: This Pokémon's moves critical hit against poisoned targets.
196.long_effetct: This Pokémon's moves critical hit against poisoned targets.

197.name: shields-down
197.prose:
When its HP becomes half or less, the Pokémon’s
shell breaks and it becomes aggressive.
197.short_effect: Transforms this Minior between Core Form and Meteor Form.  Prevents major status ailments and drowsiness while in Meteor Form.
197.long_effetct:
When this Pokémon enters battle and at the end of each turn, if its HP is 50% or above, it changes into Meteor Form; otherwise, it changes into Core Form.  In Meteor Form, it cannot be given a major status ailment (though existing ones are not cured), cannot become drowsy from []{move:yawn}, and cannot use []{move:rest} (which will simply fail).

This ability cannot be copied, replaced, or nullified.  This ability only takes effect for Minior.

198.name: stakeout
198.prose:
Doubles the damage dealt to the target’s
replacement if the target switches out.
198.short_effect: This Pokémon's moves have double power against Pokémon that switched in this turn.
198.long_effetct: This Pokémon's moves have double power against Pokémon that switched in this turn.

199.name: water-bubble
199.prose:
Lowers the power of Fire-type moves done to the
Pokémon and prevents the Pokémon from getting
a burn.
199.short_effect: Halves damage from Fire moves, doubles damage of Water moves, and prevents burns.
199.long_effetct: When this Pokémon is hit by a Fire move, the damage is halved.  When this Pokémon uses a Water move, the power is doubled.  This Pokémon cannot be burned, and if it becomes burned, the  burn is immediately ured.

200.name: steelworker
200.short_effect: This Pokémon's Steel moves have 1.5× power.
200.long_effetct: This Pokémon's Steel moves have 1.5× power.

201.name: berserk
201.prose:
Boosts the Pokémon’s Sp. Atk stat when it takes a 
hit that causes its HP to become half or less.
201.short_effect: Raises this Pokémon's Special Attack by one stage every time its HP drops below half.
201.long_effetct: Whenever this Pokémon takes damage from a move that causes its HP to drop below 50%, its Special Attack rises by one stage.

202.name: slush-rush
202.prose: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in a hailstorm.
202.short_effect: During Hail, this Pokémon has double Speed.
202.long_effetct: During Hail, this Pokémon has double Speed.

203.name: long-reach
203.prose:
The Pokémon uses its moves without making contact
with the target.
203.short_effect: This Pokémon's moves do not make contact.
203.long_effetct: A move used by this Pokémon will not make contact.

204.name: liquid-voice
204.prose: All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.
204.long_effetct: When this Pokémon uses a move that is sound-based, that move's type is Water.

205.name: triage
205.prose: Gives priority to a healing move.
205.short_effect: This Pokémon's healing moves have their priority increased by 3.
205.long_effetct: This Pokémon's healing moves have their priority increased by 3.

206.name: galvanize
206.prose:
Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves.
The power of those moves is boosted a little.
206.short_effect: This Pokémon's Normal moves are Electric and have their power increased to 1.2×.
206.long_effetct: When this Pokémon uses a Normal moves, that move is Electric its power is 1.2×.

207.name: surge-surfer
207.prose:
Doubles the Pokémon’s Speed stat on
Electric Terrain.
207.short_effect: Doubles this Pokémon's Speed on Electric Terrain.
207.long_effetct: Doubles this Pokémon's Speed on Electric Terrain.

208.name: schooling
208.prose:
When it has a lot of HP, the Pokémon forms a
powerful school. It stops schooling when its HP
is low.
208.short_effect: Wishiwashi becomes Schooling Form when its HP is 25% or higher.
208.long_effetct:
If this Pokémon is a []{pokemon:wishiwashi} and level 20 or above, then when it enters battle and at the start of each turn, it becomes Schooling Form if its HP is 25% or higher and Solo Form otherwise.

This ability cannot be replaced, copied, or nullified.

209.name: disguise
209.prose:
Once per battle, the shroud that covers the
Pokémon can protect it from an attack.
209.short_effect: Prevents the first instance of battle damage.
209.long_effetct:
If this Pokémon is in its Disguised Form and takes damage from a move, it switches to its Busted Form and the damage is prevented.  Other effects are not prevented.

This ability cannot be copied or replaced.  This ability only takes effect for Mimikyu.

210.name: battle-bond
210.prose:
Defeating an opposing Pokémon strengthens the
Pokémon’s bond with its Trainer, and it becomes
Ash-Greninja. Water Shuriken gets more powerful.
210.short_effect: Transforms this Pokémon into Ash-Greninja after fainting an opponent.  Water Shuriken's power is 20 and always hits three times.
210.long_effetct:
Transforms this Pokémon into Ash-Greninja after fainting an opponent.  Water Shuriken's power is 20 and always hits three times.

This ability cannot be copied or replaced.  This ability only takes effect for Greninja.

211.name: power-construct
211.prose:
Other Cells gather to aid when its HP becomes
half or less. Then the Pokémon changes
its form to Complete Forme.
211.short_effect: Transforms 10% or 50% Zygarde into Complete Forme when its HP is below 50%.
211.long_effetct:
Transforms 10% or 50% Zygarde into Complete Forme when its HP is below 50%.

This ability cannot be copied or replaced.  This ability only takes effect for Zygarde.

212.name: corrosion
212.prose:
The Pokémon can poison the target even if it’s
a Steel or Poison type.
212.short_effect: This Pokémon can inflict poison on Poison and Steel Pokémon.
212.long_effetct: This Pokémon's moves and item ignore the usual immunity of Poison and Steel Pokémon when attempting to inflict poison.

213.name: comatose
213.prose:
It’s always drowsing and will never wake up.
It can attack without waking up.
213.short_effect: This Pokémon always  acts as though it were Asleep.
213.long_effetct: This Pokémon always acts as though it were Asleep.  It cannot be given another status ailment; it's unaffected by []{move:yawn}; it can use []{move:sleep-talk}; and so on.

214.name: queenly-majesty
214.prose:
Its majesty pressures the opposing Pokémon,
making it unable to attack using priority moves.
214.short_effect: Opposing Pokémon cannot use priority attacks.
214.long_effetct: When an opposing Pokémon attempts to use a move that targets this Pokémon or an ally, and that move has priority, it will fail.

215.name: innards-out
215.prose:
Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit
by the amount equal to its last HP.
215.short_effect: When this Pokémon faints from an opponent's move, that opponent takes damage equal to the HP this Pokémon had remaining.
215.long_effetct: When this Pokémon faints from an opponent's move, that opponent takes damage equal to the HP this Pokémon had remaining.

216.name: dancer
216.prose:
When another Pokémon uses a dance move,
it can use a dance move following it regardless
of its Speed.
216.short_effect: Whenever another Pokémon uses a dance move, this Pokémon will use the same move immediately afterwards.
216.long_effetct: Whenever another Pokémon uses a dance move, this Pokémon will use the same move immediately afterwards.

217.name: battery
217.prose: Powers up ally Pokémon’s special moves.
217.short_effect: Ally Pokémon's moves have their power increased to 1.3×.
217.long_effetct: Ally Pokémon's moves have their power increased to 1.3×.

218.name: fluffy
218.prose:
Halves the damage taken from moves that make
direct contact, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.
218.short_effect: Damage from contact moves is halved.  Damage from Fire moves is doubled.
218.long_effetct: Damage from contact moves is halved.  Damage from Fire moves is doubled.

219.name: dazzling
219.prose:
Surprises the opposing Pokémon, making it unable
to attack using priority moves.
219.short_effect: Opposing Pokémon cannot use priority attacks.
219.long_effetct: When an opposing Pokémon attempts to use a move that targets this Pokémon or an ally, and that move has priority, it will fail.

220.name: soul-heart
220.prose: Boosts its Sp. Atk stat every time a Pokémon faints.
220.short_effect: This Pokémon's Special Attack rises by one stage every time any Pokémon faints.
220.long_effetct: This Pokémon's Special Attack rises by one stage every time any Pokémon faints.

221.name: tangling-hair
221.prose:
Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s
Speed stat.
221.short_effect: When this Pokémon takes regular damage from a contact move, the attacking Pokémon's Speed lowers by one stage.
221.long_effetct: When this Pokémon takes regular damage from a contact move, the attacking Pokémon's Speed lowers by one stage.

222.name: receiver
222.prose: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.
222.short_effect: When an ally faints, this Pokémon gains its Ability.
222.long_effetct: When an ally faints, this Pokémon gains its Ability.

223.name: power-of-alchemy
223.prose: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.
223.short_effect: When an ally faints, this Pokémon gains its Ability.
223.long_effetct: When an ally faints, this Pokémon gains its Ability.

224.name: beast-boost
224.prose:
The Pokémon boosts its most proficient stat each
time it knocks out a Pokémon.
224.short_effect: Raises this Pokémon's highest stat by one stage when it faints another Pokémon.
224.long_effetct: Raises this Pokémon's highest stat by one stage when it faints another Pokémon.

225.name: rks-system
225.prose:
Changes the Pokémon’s type to match the
memory disc it holds.
225.short_effect: Changes this Pokémon's type to match its held Memory.
225.long_effetct:
Changes this Pokémon's type to match its held Memory.

This ability cannot be copied, replaced, or nullified.  This ability only takes effect for Silvally.

226.name: electric-surge
226.prose:
Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the
Pokémon enters a battle.
226.short_effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Electric Terrain.
226.long_effetct: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to []{move:electric-terrain}.

227.name: psychic-surge
227.prose:
Turns the ground into Psychic Terrain when
the Pokémon enters a battle.
227.short_effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Psychic Terrain.
227.long_effetct: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to []{move:psychic-terrain}.

228.name: misty-surge
228.prose:
Turns the ground into Misty Terrain when
the Pokémon enters a battle.
228.short_effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Misty Terrain.
228.long_effetct: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to []{move:misty-terrain}.

229.name: grassy-surge
229.prose:
Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when
the Pokémon enters a battle.
229.short_effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Grassy Terrain.
229.long_effetct: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to []{move:grassy-terrain}.

230.name: full-metal-body
230.prose:
Prevents other Pokémon’s moves or Abilities from
lowering the Pokémon’s stats.
230.short_effect: Other Pokémon cannot lower this Pokémon's stats.
230.long_effetct:
This Pokémon's stats cannot be lowered by other Pokémon's moves or abilities.  This effect only applies to normal stat modifications and not more exotic effects such as []{move:topsy-turvy} or []{move:power-swap}.

This Ability is not bypassed by []{ability:mold-breaker}, []{ability:teravolt}, or []{ability:turboblaze}.

231.name: shadow-shield
231.prose:
Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes
while its HP is full.
231.short_effect: When this Pokémon has full HP, regular damage from moves is halved.
231.long_effetct:
When this Pokémon has full HP, regular damage (not fixed damage!) from moves is halved.

This ability cannot be nullified.

232.name: prism-armor
232.prose: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
232.long_effetct:
Super-effective damage this Pokémon takes is reduced to 0.75×.

This Ability is not bypassed by []{ability:mold-breaker}, []{ability:teravolt}, or []{ability:turboblaze}.

233.name: neuroforce
233.prose: Powers up moves that are super effective.
